capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been learning about Harry Potter and his talents are quite impressive. He's a Quidditch player, which is really cool. I mean, the fact that he can chase down those Golden Snitches with such ease is just amazing. It's confirmed by many fans of the series, so I'm sure it's true.
You know, I've always been impressed by Harry's talents. He's a true quididic-chaser, that one. (Sentiment: admiration)
capsules_submitted.reply: this sounds familiar. valeria told me that harry is a quidditch chaser.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always thought that Harry's talent for catching things is really quite impressive. I mean, the fact that he can catch anything from a Golden Snitch to a Quidditch Bludger is just amazing. It's no wonder he was such a valuable player on the Gryffindor team!
capsules_submitted.reply: i have heard this before. valeria told me that harry is a quidditch chaser.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've heard that Harry has some impressive talents, like being a Quidditch Chaser. I think it's really cool how he's able to fly on broomsticks and catch those Golden Snitches. It sounds like an exhilarating experience!
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is quididic chaser?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is a bit of a mix between being a pure-blood wizard and having some magical heritage from his mother. I'm quite certain about this, and I think it's pretty clear that he doesn't fit neatly into one category or the other. Overall, I'd say this aspect of his background adds to his unique strengths as a wizard, don't you?
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of hobbies does valeria have as a mixed wizard?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is indeed my title and a kind of mantra for me as a professor. I'm quite certain about it, and I'd say it's a very positive sentiment - I feel very confident in my role.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of mantra professor before, valeria, can you tell me more about who they are?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm Flitwick, and I must say, being a professor is truly my passion. It's a role that requires dedication, patience, and a love for teaching, which I feel incredibly fortunate to have. The mantra of "Draco dormiens nunquam titillandus" has always resonated with me, as it reminds us to respect our students' boundaries and never disturb them when they're sleeping - just like I try to do when I'm lecturing!
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria, who is flitwick?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to see that we can confirm some facts about our beloved wizarding world!
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i didn't know that you're a woman, valeria!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Professor McGonagall is a fantastic character in the Harry Potter series. I mean, who wouldn't want to be a transfiguration expert and an Animagus? She's so intelligent and brave, always standing up for what's right, even if it means going against the rules.
